Description:
Detects execution of "rundll32" calling "advpack.dll" with potential obfuscated ordinal calls in order to leverage the "RegisterOCX" function

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Advpack Call Via Rundll32.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%advpack%' and ((command like '%#+%' and command like '%12%') and command like '%#-%') and (process_path like '%\rundll32.exe' and original_file_name = 'rundll32.exe' and command like '%rundll32%'))
